channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: The big bosh! burger
item.description:
The big bosh! burger



We do love a good burger, and creating a big meaty tasting burger was high up on our list of priorities. This one gets its richness from sweet potatoes, black beans and a whole host of herbs.

item.title: Speedy lamb naans
item.description:
Speedy lamb naans



These speedy lamb naans with lamb mince are an ideal quick supper dish that uses only five ingredients - lamb mince, sun-dried tomatoes, baby spinach leaves, plain naan bread, mozzerella cheese and some store cupboard ingredients.

item.title: Aushak - afghan dumplings
item.description:
Aushak - afghan dumplings



Aushak are an Afghan version of dumplings, usually filled with leeks, onions, or chives. It's served with creamy garlic yogurt and a hearty tomato-based meat or lentil sauce. As aushak are time-consuming to make, this dish is usually reserved for special occasions. Filling and sealing the aushak is a wonderful opportunity to sit together and prepare this lovely dish in good company.

item.title: Berbere spiced chicken, carrots and chickpeas
item.description:
Berbere spiced chicken, carrots and chickpeas



Berbere is an Ethiopian spice blend with quite a bit of a kick, so use a little less if you’re not into heat. We use store-bought berbere spice, but you can also toast and grind your own homemade blend, especially if you have a well-stocked spice rack. We love this for being a complete meal in a tray, but wouldn’t say no to a big ol’ bowl of greens to eat alongside.
